Articles.Content:
So when I watch documentaries and interviews involving astronauts, they usually talk about the vibration associated with a rocket launch. Particularly the Saturn V, where I remember an astronaut saying it was difficult to even see the instrument panel from the vibration.

Would it be possible to add vibrations in IVA view during rocket launches?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T13:31:42Z" title="04/01/2015 01:31  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by Maximus97**
There's a mod for that. Don't remember the name of it, though. I agree it should be stock.

> 
> There's a mod for that. Don't remember the name of it, though. I agree it should be stock.

Kerbquake is the mod, anyway it would be nice (maybe better with a toggle) to have in stock
I agree with the above statement
As long as it was subtle/gentle.
Nice! I just saw that in the devnotes yesterday!
